climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Dishwasher detergent tablets are a zero-waste way for consumers to help reduce their impact on the environment. Comes in a 100% recyclable cardboard box. Formulated with plant-based ingredients, these sheets are free of harsh chemicals and resist baking stains and grease, making them safer for the environment. Consumers simply fold a sheet to fit in the main detergent compartment and let the dishwasher do the rest.
Low suds formula cleans easily - ecological, hypoallergenic, biodegradable, preservative-free, phosphate-free, bleach-free, whitener-free. Same powerful cleaning results with easier rinsing
For all machines, each dishwasher sheet is designed to dissolve completely during the wash cycle and your dishes will be spotless and naturally shiny after washing

An extremely lightweight and extremely compact alternative to liquids, powders, tablets and pods - when it comes to saving your space, I can't imagine a better option for saving space, no mess, no waste -
Less CO2 emissions in transport, less damage to the atmosphere, recyclable packaging and less plastic pollution on the planet. So, we're greener than traditional dishwasher detergents

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a countertop dishwasher - so I have to rinse my dishes really well before using the machine. One sheet has always worked perfectly for my needs - but the instructions do say to use more sheets for more items. I will continue to use these so long as I have the dishwasher!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not work as represented.
reviews.reviewText: I was anxious to try these sheets as I had read the reviews that said this was a good product. So I used as directed and I was disappointed in the cleanliness of my dishes.I always rinse and use a plastic bristled brush to scrape off any food before placing in my dishwasher. I use the dishwasher for sterilization purposes.I have used cascade packets in the past and they do a wonderful job.I am sorry these did not work as claimed. I want to support businesses that claim they are helping our planet by using their products but the product has to do the job it was claimed to do for me to continue its use.I am also upset with the return policy on this product as it only had less then a month window to return.To be fair the product needs at least 2 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not very good
reviews.reviewText: this is the first kind of these sheets I have tried. Unfortunately they don't clean as well as my cascade liquid. I even mop off the bulk of food before loading the dishwasher, but some smears didn't wash off. I still believe in this idea, but I think I'll try a different brand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s great for everything it claims to be for BUT the dishwasher
reviews.reviewText: I think this is a great idea, we need to get rid of plastics. However, this did not work in the dishwasher. I tried using different numbers of sheets, running the dishwasher on different cycles. but still my glasses were foggy and my dished just didn’t get clean. I went back to my eco-friendly tablets. They do work great in the pre-wash of my dishwasher and they are great in the sink, cleaning up little messes and cleaning hands. Honestly, that’s great and I probably would have bought it as a multi use cleaner. It just shouldn’t be used as dishwasher detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep dishes clean
reviews.reviewText: Love the scent of this and I put one or two independent on how dirty my dishes are, and they all come sparkling clean. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A green product is great, but it's not green if it doesn't work and you're forced to buy something else. First time using this product. Used two sheets on a full load and the dishes remained dirty and had tons of spots (I use Finish rinse aid and have a dishwasher with a built-in water softener). Ran the load again with 3 sheets and they still weren't clean. Into the trash it goes. Photos are after the second run. Complete waste of money for a worthless product.Made in China... no surprise there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative to pods
reviews.reviewText: Work as good as pods without leaving the white powdery film behind that some pods tend to do. Package takes up way less space and are easy to access.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great product, eco friendly
